scripts.proto:check: pbjs -t json ../proto/dashstream.proto | diff -q - src/proto/dashstream.schema.json || (echo 'ERROR: Proto schema out of sync. Run: npm run proto:gen' && exit 1)
scripts.test:unit: tsx src/__tests__/attributes.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/jsonPatch.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/mermaidRenderer.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/parseConfigFromUrl.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/stateHash.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/timeFormat.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/schemaDiff.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/grouping.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/graphTypes.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/GraphCanvasPlaceholder.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/GraphNodeLogic.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/GroupNode.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/NodeDetailsPanel.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/MermaidView.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/StateDiffViewer.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/ExecutionTimeline.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/StateViewer.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/SchemaHistoryPanel.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/ErrorBoundary.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/TimelineSlider.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/GraphNode.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/GraphCanvas.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/Tooltip.test.tsx && tsx src/__tests__/DecodeWorkerPool.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/dashstream.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/useRunStateStoreUtils.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/tokens.test.ts && tsx src/__tests__/graphExport.test.ts
scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit
